about_the_game:
Based on the hit television series Lana Longbeard in this early access prologue you will get to enter into the wacky world of the seven realms. Meet all your favorite characters from Andar, to Greta and even Horatius Hofenstance!

Filled with the irreverent comedic writing of the series, complete quests on your adventure to uncover the mystery of the Golden Stacks and take down a looming shadowy threat that intends to take over the realm themselves.

Take control of the Might Windbreaker, the great sailing vessel as you explore a vast sea of exciting locations. 

Run, Jump and throw your boomerang as you explore just a taste of the game to come which will feature a cooperative experience allowing you and a friend to venture forth over the great sea together.

Filled with the irreverent comedic writing of the series, complete quests on your adventure to uncover the mystery of the Golden Stacks and take down a looming shadowy threat that intends to take over the realm themselves.

Take control of the Might Windbreaker, the great sailing vessel as you explore a vast sea of exciting locations. 

Run, Jump and throw your boomerang as you explore just a taste of the game to come which will feature a cooperative experience allowing you and a friend to venture forth over the great sea together.
name: Lana Longbeard And The Golden Stacks - Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-5257U Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 921 MB available space

short_description: Enter the seven realms of Lana Longbeard in this 3D Adventure game based on the hit television series. Explore a vast sea of unique and interesting locations. Meet and help wacky characters as you uncover the mystery of the Golden Stacks.
